bmiMealGenerator.title: BMI Meal Planner
bmiMealGenerator.description: Scientific meal plans based on your Body Mass Index
bmiMealGenerator.desc_severe_malnutrition: Critical condition requiring immediate medical attention. This indicates severe wasting and high risk of complications.
bmiMealGenerator.desc_moderate_malnutrition: Warning sign indicating significant weight loss. Specialized nutritional support is needed to prevent deterioration.
bmiMealGenerator.desc_underweight: Your weight is lower than recommended for your height. This may affect your immunity and energy levels. Consult a nutritionist for a healthy weight gain plan.
bmiMealGenerator.desc_healthy: Congratulations! Your weight is in the healthy range. Keep up the balanced diet and regular physical activity.
bmiMealGenerator.desc_overweight: Your weight is slightly above the healthy range. Adopting a balanced diet and increasing physical activity can help you reach a healthy weight.
bmiMealGenerator.desc_obese: Your weight is significantly higher than recommended, which may increase health risks. Professional medical advice and a lifestyle change plan are recommended.
